summary.span: 命名空間包含可用來支援在 LINQ to SQL 應用程式中與關聯式資料庫互動的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that support interaction with relational databases in LINQ to SQL applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 是一種技術，提供執行階段基礎結構管理的關聯式資料當做物件。 is a technology that provides a run-time infrastructure for managing relational data as objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
